name: Larry VS Aliens
description:
In this game you move around using your shotgun. Larry is fat and is not that fast so he cant move that much using his legs so he shoots his way forward.

Controls:

A & D for sideways movement.

Leftmousebutton is the shot button.

Rightmousebutton is your "fart" button, this makes you stand still in the air.

This game was made with Unity and was a school project, it was made by 6 people, three programmers and three artist. If you find bugs you can report them but we will probably never patch this.

The small icon in his head was made using Logomaker https://hatchful.shopify.com
